text.div: • Include codes from http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-RoleLinkType where concept is-a REPL

name: RoleLinkReplaces
title: RoleLinkReplaces
description: This relationship indicates that the source Role replaces (or subsumes) the target Role. Allows for new identifiers and/or new effective time for a registry entry or a certification, etc.
